name: Projekt C0re
description:
Intro

Welcome to Projekt_C0re. You arrived in a distant future armed only with a single weapon.

Don't be fooled though, this is not a regular one. Using the latest future technology it can change functionality by collecting different powerups.

The mission is to reach the C0re of the world.

Controls

[WSAD] - to move

[SPACE] - jump

[SHIFT] - run

[TAB] - customize weapon

[MOUSE LEFT] - fire
